process.name: Scrum-Modified v2
process.description: Agile Fit Office Default Template (Managed by Kristine Hembre's Team)

fields.name: Configuration Required
fields.description: Does this work item require any configuration? If other is selected please add details to the discussion field.

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the bug

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the number of units of work remaining to complete this bug

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: The type should be set to Business primarily to represent customer-facing issues. Work to change the architecture should be added as a Product Backlog Item

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the feature

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the feature is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the feature more time critical

fields.name: Approval Date
fields.description: This field is to be used in Test Cases to capture the date for when the test case was approved.

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

workItemTypes.name: Proposal
workItemTypes.description: Copy over from old template used by ePrism/HRO

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Server-side data for a set of steps to be tested.

workItemTypes.name: Incident
workItemTypes.description: These are incidents auto generated by Service Now

workItemTypes.name: Portfolio Epic
workItemTypes.description: Portfolio epics are the highest-level summary of work. They reflect substantial investments that span an Agile product area. Portfolio epics are leveraged at the overall product area level, but can be prioritized at the planning unit level.

workItemTypes.name: Product Backlog Item
workItemTypes.description: Tracks an activity the user will be able to perform with the product.

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Tracks work that needs to be done.

rules.friendlyName: Read Only - SN Product Owner (SN Tab)
Read Only - Run or Grow (SN Tab)
Read Only - Number of Resources (SN Tab)
Read Only - Investment Category Rollup (SN Tab)
Restrict State from Assigned to Closed
Restrict State from In Progress to Closed
Restrict State from OnHold to Closed
Restrict State transition New to Closed
Make Assigned To required in In Progress
Make Assigned To required in Assigned
Make Contact Type Read Only (SN Tab)
Make ADO Capitalized Portfolio Epic as required

conditions.value: Base operations  - Routine System Maintenance,  Support  and  Tech wellness

rules.friendlyName: Read Only - SN Product Owner (SN Tab)
Read Only - Run or Grow (SN Tab)
Read Only - Investment Category Rollup (SN Tab)
Set Bug Identified required when state changes to In done
Set Bug Identified required when state changes to In progress
Set fields required when state changes to Done
Set fields required when state changes to In progress
Set Capitalized when type of story is NA
Set Capitalized TRUE when type of story is Creating new

conditions.value: Creating new and / or improving functionality

rules.friendlyName: Set Capitalized FALSE when type of story is data conversion
Set Capitalized FALSE when type of story is Operation and Support
Make Investment Type ADO required when state is done
Set value for "Type of Story Hint" - NA
Set value for "Type of Story Hint" - Creating new functionality

conditions.value: Creating new and / or improving functionality

actions.value: 1. Design of chosen path, 2. Software configuration, 3. Software interfacing, 4. Testing for new and improved development / functionality, 5. Fixing defects found during warranty phase, < 90 days post implementation, 6. Creating, developing, and / or configuring software to perform data conversion

rules.friendlyName: Set value for "Type of Story Hint" - Data Conversion

actions.value: 1. Purging or cleansing existing data, 2. Reconciliation and  balancing of the old data to data in the new system, 3.  Converting and / or moving the data from the old system to new system

rules.friendlyName: Set value for "Type of Story Hint" - Operation and Support

actions.value: 1. Training, 2. Ongoing application maintenance / support, 3. Deployment in a production environment including any redeployments, 4. Fixing defects found after the warranty phase, > 90 days post implementation, 5. Testing (defects, bugs, production support, small enhancements), 6. Project administration, meeting, resource management, and reporting are considered support

rules.friendlyName: Read Only - Run or Grow (SN Tab)
Read Only - Investment Category Rollup (SN Tab)
